description: Gnome HIG Mirror and Analysis - Create a local mirror of the Gnome HIG and analyze content.

userStories.title: Gnome HIG Mirror Script
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a script that downloads the Gnome HIG website so that I can reference it offline and ensure we have a fixed version to work from.
acceptanceCriteria: Script uses `wget` or similar tool to recursively download the site
Links within the mirror are converted for local viewing
userStories.notes: Verified script executes and mirrors content.

userStories.title: Guidelines Analysis Document
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a structured summary of the HIG relevant to GIMP/Vimp so that I can implement the UI correctly without constantly wading through the full documentation.
acceptanceCriteria: Document covers key areas: Application Layout, Navigation, Common Patterns, Visual Style
Content is tailored to the context of porting GIMP
Includes references/links to the local mirror
